title: Capps Van Steve Bartman wins $3.7 million in nine years of betting on cubs.
subtitle: Reports say Steve Bartman won $3.7 million when the Cubs team first arrived at the World Championship since 1945 is bogus news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The notorious Chicago Caps fan Steve Bartman won $3.7 million after betting the team would be at the 2016 World Championship.
